glassfish.security.auth.jdbc.util.factory.passwordtypes

Class BcryptPassword

  • java.lang.Object
    • glassfish.security.auth.jdbc.util.factory.passwordtypes.BcryptPassword
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPasswordType

    public class BcryptPassword
extends Object
implements IPasswordType
    BcryptPassword class allows to encrypt a plaintext password with the Bcrypt algorithm and check that a plaintext password matches a previously encrypted one.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    RienderieN
    See Also:
    MessageDigestPassword, UnencryptedPassword

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_LOG_ROUNDS
      The default Bcrypt log round, if the log round argument isn't informed (value: 8).
      static int MAX_LOG_ROUNDS
      The maximum Bcrypt log rounds allowed (value: 31).
      static int MIN_LOG_ROUNDS
      The minimum Bcrypt log rounds allowed (value: 4).

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a BcryptPassword instance with the specified arguments.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkPassword(String plainPassword, String hashedPassword)
      Check that a plaintext password matches a previously encrypted one.
      String encryptPassword(String password)

    • Constructor Detail

      • BcryptPassword

        public BcryptPassword(String salt,
              String logRound,
              SecureRandom secureRandom)
               throws PasswordTypeException
        Creates a BcryptPassword instance with the specified arguments.

        Parameters:
        salt - A plaintext salt to concat to a plaintext password. May be null.
        logRound - A number of rounds of hashing to apply. May be null.
        secureRandom - An instance of SecureRandom. May be null.
        Throws:
        PasswordTypeException - if the logRound argument cannot be parsed to an integer, if the logRound argument isn't between MIN_LOG_ROUNDS and MAX_LOG_ROUNDS range.

      • BcryptPassword

        public BcryptPassword(String salt,
              String logRound)
               throws PasswordTypeException
        Creates a BcryptPassword instance with the specified arguments.

        Parameters:
        salt - A plaintext salt to concat to a plaintext password. May be null.
        logRound - A number of rounds of hashing to apply. May be null.
        Throws:
        PasswordTypeException - if the logRound arguments isn't between MIN_LOG_ROUNDS and MAX_LOG_ROUNDS.

      • BcryptPassword

        public BcryptPassword()
               throws PasswordTypeException
        Throws:
        PasswordTypeException

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(String plainPassword,
                    String hashedPassword)
        Description copied from interface: IPasswordType
        Check that a plaintext password matches a previously encrypted one.

        Specified by:
        checkPassword in interface IPasswordType
        Parameters:
        plainPassword - A plaintext password to check.
        hashedPassword - A previously encrypted password.
        Returns:
        true if the the passwords match, false otherwise.
